task.summary: Default task

-alert dialog for picking a date before 1998

-scrols to the top on load -added icon
-loads on load
-fixed some stuff. don't know what.
added fail dialog for loading html
-fixed prayer label
-contact added to menu -hitting home button on settings goes back
-reload verse if language was changed -remove auto load images from preferences
-added more language support
-added time preference for daily reminder
-updated code for time picker
-added titles for languaages
-if user not on internet it says so when downloading html
-reload verse if language changed in preferences whether hitting home or back
-user can change holo theme.
-alarm is toasting and time is gotten corectly. alarm is set for the settings time

-alarm set in settings -toast shown for when alarm is set
-finaly actionbar sherlock works on 2.3. -added menu for < sdk 11 and icons
